Description: High-backed chair of sycomore fig wood; seat of woven string(worn).
Curator's comments: Published: Baker, Furniture in the Ancient World, (1966), p.132, pl.187. G. Killen, Ancient Egyptian Furniture I (1980), p.54 no.2 pl.86, fig.29. G. Killen, Egyptian Woodworking and Furniture, (1984), pl.56, p.47. Shaw and Nicholson, BM Dictionary of Ancient Egypt, (1995), p.107. 362, 363 fig. 15.35-36
